update pension_shiftchange_record set shifter_id = #{shifterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shifter_name = #{shifterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, successor_id = #{successorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, successor_name = #{successorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, change_content = #{changeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newolder_amount = #{newolderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outhosp_amount = #{outhospAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inhosp_amount = #{inhospAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, returnhome_amount = #{returnhomeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icu_older = #{icuOlder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, older_safe = #{olderSafe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, older_health = #{olderHealth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, environment_health = #{environmentHealth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_detail = #{equipmentDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sended = #{sended,jdbcType=INTEGER}, affirmed = #{affirmed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT *
from
pension_shiftchange_record record
where
1=1
and unix_timestamp(change_time) >=unix_timestamp(#{startDate})
and unix_timestamp(date_add(#{endDate}, interval 1 day)) >=unix_timestamp(change_time)
and shifter_id=#{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and successor_id=#{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and sended = 1
and ( (successor_id=#{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and sended = 1) or shifter_id=#{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
and cleared = 2 ORDER BY change_time DESC
